author: Jim Thomas
comment: I was a little nervous at first with 1 review and just a couple downloada for 2.50 but i went for it.  Omg its easy to use and sync. Works very well and happy I decided to download this.   Dont know if ill ever use my watch to listen to music but its nice to have :)  great work/app. Highly recommend.  One small request would be to add a random feature for songs :)
title: Reluctant at first

author: Alim Khan
comment: Not a good app. for the price we pay. I'm not able to transfer the music except one. The rest of the music are just in process for hours. I think someone else had the same issue. He had Note 4 & Sony sm3. Is it android wear 5.1 or is this a poorly made application? Looks like the developer is fast to get cash but not working properly. Uninstalled then reinstalled but still the same issue moreover the previously downloaded music duplicates.
title: Note 4 and LG Urbane

author: Jason Leach
comment: Not going to good so far. Please could you tell me how to sync music to my watch. Have selected 2 tracks to copy but it just hangs with the two bars flashing to say they are copying but nothing happens have selected getup tracks but they have been hanging all morning. Please help as would love to get this working. I am using a galaxy s7 with a huawei watch 2

author: Daniel Nelson
comment: It only allows me to sync ringtones to my watch, even though I have all of my music downloaded to my phone. Totally worthless.
title: Doesn't work

author: Luqman Shafiq
comment: Any way I could have voice command play music to play from this app instead? Thank you. The only things keeping this app from perfect is a need for a delete button(coz doesnt really sync well, i had to clear data the app), and a shuffle button
title: Awesome app

author: Richard Stephens
comment: What was Google thinking when they wrote the spec for Play Music on the Wear device? Play Music does let you play music standalone from the watch... BUT only if you have a subscription and only for music you downloaded from Google Play. This app lets me select MP3s from my own collection.
title: Works great!

author: Maximilian Krob
comment: Definitely the best standalone music app for wear so far, but it needs shuffle and repeat settings, controls on the card, and bug fixes for the buttons that change size and move around.

author: Rob Bladen
comment: It has been very useful, although there is only one issue I've noticed which is that you cannot cancel transferring songs to the watch, and if you accidentally select transfer all for 100 songs it becomes a problem..
title: Extremely good app

author: thu vu
comment: But where is delete button? And one more issue is if the bluetooth is disconnected during the song transfer process, when the bluetooth is connected again, it will not resume syncing these selected songs anymore no matter what u do...LG G watch
title: Okay

author: LaRoy Turner
comment: Been more then a year with no update. Broken app, I have to reset watch to get music off. Total rip off!
title: No update, no delete

author: Christopher Alexander
comment: Causes Play Services to crash repeatedly while transferring first song. Had to restart phone.  Nexus 5, SmartWatch 3.
title: Very buggy

author: Paul Stirk
comment: Able to download music from my library and not restricted to Google Play music downloads.  Works OK on Sony Smartwatch 3.  Well done and thank you.
title: Android Wear Music App with Offline capabilities

author: antonio laginha
comment: I would keep the app if I knew how to delete songs ... it's the most basic requirement what were you thinking ?
title: Why don't you give support and tell us how to delete songs ?

author: Phillip Nguyen
comment: You should add in an option to control music playing from your phone (like to wired earphones instead of bluetooth)

author: Paul Needleman
comment: Easy way to get music onto my watch
title: Great app

author: john spiers
comment: Its working good but needs shuffle mode please
title: Smartwatch 3 and note4

author: Ahmed Alawadhi
comment: How to delete songs ?
title: Delete

author: Christian Byrnes
comment: LG G Watch. Problem with UI. For example the Play symbol is too far to the left, almost on top of the previous song symbol. Still testing it now...
title: Good start!

author: Enrique de Guzman
comment: Its ok, unstable.  A better alternative is an app called WearMedia.

author: Ben M
comment: You can import 1 song to the watch and then it stuck on loading
title: Do not buy this app!

author: Ibrokhim Bobokhonov
comment: Good idea but I can't delete music
